pages.text: Rather than other Lesser Demons who lord over Fortresses of Hell or lurk beyond the angles of our reality, Cambions instead live a wretched life on Earth. Cambions are the offspring of demons and humanoids, and their most common sire is Leonard, but this is not always the case.

While the most common unholy union is between male demons (especially Leonard)  and female humanoids, the reverse has been noted as well. In addition, Cambions are sometimes humans who attempted to ascent into a demon with the help of Leonard, but this “ascension” is dubious and rarely successful.
